thread.title: Kourtney K Bieber hang out together at Universal Studios
thread.title_full: Kourtney K Bieber hang out together at Universal Studios

title: Kourtney K Bieber hang out together at Universal Studios
text:
Kourtney K, Bieber hang out together at Universal Studios 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Sunday 11th October, 2015 
Kourtney Kardashian and Justin Bieber were recently spotted hanging out together at Universal Studios Hollywood during one of its Halloween Horror Nights. 
The 36-year-old TV personality wore a nude tank top and white skinny jeans, while the 21-year-old singer donned a hooded camo jacket, black pants and white sneakers, E! Online reports. 
An insider revealed that the 'Keeping Up With the Kardashians' star and the 'Baby' hit-maker, who exited The Nice Guy restaurant together in West Hollywood, dined separately with groups of pals. 
Later, the 'Baby' hit-maker took to his Instagram page to share the black and white pic of their hangout that shows the Bieber and the Kardashian star at the theme park. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News
